mapper.select: select id noticeId, info_title noticeTitle from t_site_investment_info where publish_status = '1' order by date_top desc limit 0,3

select title adTitle, picture_url adImageUrl, partner_url adPartnerUrl, open_type openType from t_site_adv_info where status = '1' and adv_type = #{opSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and date_visible <= NOW() ORDER BY date_top desc

select (SELECT FORMAT(IFNULL(sum(raised_amount), 0),0) FROM t_project_info ) as raiseTotal, (select count(1) from t_project_info where project_status != '4' ) as projectCount, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_order_support sup WHERE sup.`status` NOT IN(1,2,9) AND IFNULL(sup.refund_type,0) IN(0,1,2) ) as memberCount
SELECT label_type_id labelTypeId, label_name labelName,label_id labelId FROM t_project_label_type WHERE project_type = '1'

SELECT thb.hospital_id hospitalId, thb.hospital_name hospitalName, ( SELECT COUNT(tos.order_id) FROM t_order_support tos WHERE tos.`status` not in ('1','2') AND IFNULL(tos.refund_type,0) in ('0','1','2') AND tos.project_id = tpi.project_id ) supportCount, tpi.cover_image_url projectImg, tpi.project_id projectId, tpi.project_name projectName, floor(tpi.target_amount) targetAmount, tpi.project_type, tpi.project_label projectLabel, floor(tpi.raised_amount) raiseTotal, datediff(tpi.date_raised_end, now()) remainingDay, tpv.foundation_name foundationName, tpi.project_status projectStatus, tpi.cover_image_url coverImageUrl, tpi.date_create dateCreate, IFNULL(LEFT(((tpi.raised_amount / tpi.target_amount)) ,4), 0.00 ) rate, (SELECT tpv.recipient_real_name from t_project_validation tpv WHERE tpv.project_id = tpi.project_id) recipientRealName FROM t_project_validation tpv LEFT JOIN t_project_info tpi ON tpv.project_id = tpi.project_id LEFT JOIN t_hospital_basic thb ON tpi.project_creator_id = thb.hospital_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND tpi.project_status IN ('1','2') AND tpv.audit_status = '3'
and tpi.project_name LIKE CONCAT ('%',trim(#{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
and tpi.project_label LIKE CONCAT ('%',trim(#{projectLabel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
and tpi.project_status LIKE CONCAT ('%',trim(#{projectStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
ORDER BY tpi.date_update DESC

SELECT thb.hospital_id hospitalId, thb.hospital_name hospitalName, ( SELECT COUNT(tos.order_id) FROM t_order_support tos WHERE tos.`status` not in ('1','2') AND IFNULL(tos.refund_type,0) in ('0','1','2') AND tos.project_id = tpi.project_id ) supportCount, tpi.cover_image_url projectImg, tpi.project_id projectId, tpi.project_name projectName, floor(tpi.target_amount) targetAmount, tpi.project_type, floor(tpi.raised_amount) raiseTotal, datediff(tpi.date_raised_end, now()) remainingDay, tpv.foundation_name foundationName, tpi.project_status projectStatus, tpi.cover_image_url coverImageUrl, tpi.date_create dateCreate, IFNULL(LEFT(((tpi.raised_amount / tpi.target_amount)) ,4), 0.00 ) rate, (SELECT tpv.recipient_real_name from t_project_validation tpv WHERE tpv.project_id = tpi.project_id) recipientRealName FROM t_project_validation tpv LEFT JOIN t_project_info tpi ON tpv.project_id = tpi.project_id LEFT JOIN t_hospital_basic thb ON tpi.project_creator_id = thb.hospital_id
WHERE tpi.project_status = '1' AND tpv.audit_status = '3' ORDER BY tpi.date_update DESC

SELECT thb.hospital_name hospitalName, p.project_id projectId, tpv.foundation_name foundationName, u.nick_name nickName, TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY,DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d'),DATE_FORMAT(p.date_raised_end,'%Y-%m-%d')) timeLeft, p.cover_image_url projectImg, p.project_name projectName, p.project_intro projectIntro, p.project_label projectTag, (select IFNULL(count(1),0) from t_order_support where project_id = p.project_id and `status` not in (1,2,9) and IFNULL(refund_type,0) IN(0,1,2)) supportCount, floor(p.target_amount) targetAmount, floor(p.raised_amount) raiseTotal, p.project_type projectType, IFNULL(LEFT(((p.raised_amount / p.target_amount)) ,4), 0.00 ) rate FROM t_site_home_project ho LEFT JOIN t_project_info p on ho.project_id = p.project_id LEFT JOIN t_q_user_basic u on p.project_creator_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN t_hospital_basic thb on thb.hospital_id = p.project_creator_id LEFT JOIN t_project_validation tpv on tpv.project_id = p.project_id
1 = 1
AND p.project_label like CONCAT ('%',trim(#{tagType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
AND p.project_type = #{projectType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND ho.recommend_pc = 1
AND ho.recommend_weixin = 1
AND ho.recommend_app = 1
ORDER BY ho.date_pc DESC
ORDER BY ho.date_weixin DESC
ORDER BY ho.date_app DESC
ORDER BY ${sorting} ${order}

SELECT thb.hospital_name hospitalName, p.project_id projectId, tpv.foundation_name foundationName, p.cover_image_url projectImg, p.project_name projectName, TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY,DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d'),DATE_FORMAT(p.date_raised_end,'%Y-%m-%d')) timeLeft, p.project_intro projectIntro, p.project_type projectType, FORMAT(p.raised_amount,0) raiseTotal, FORMAT(p.target_amount,0) targetAmount, (select IFNULL(count(1),0) from t_order_support where project_id = p.project_id and `status` not in (1,2,9) and IFNULL(refund_type,0) IN(0,1,2)) supportCount, IFNULL(LEFT(((p.raised_amount / p.target_amount)) ,4), 0.00 ) rate FROM t_site_home_project ho LEFT JOIN t_project_info p on ho.project_id = p.project_id LEFT JOIN t_hospital_basic thb on thb.hospital_id = p.project_creator_id LEFT JOIN t_project_validation tpv on tpv.project_id = p.project_id WHERE ho.recommend_pc = 1 ORDER BY ho.date_pc DESC LIMIT 0,6
SELECT hospital_id hospitalId, hospital_name hospitalName FROM t_hospital_basic WHERE t_hospital_basic.recommend_status = '1' ORDER BY t_hospital_basic.hospital_id DESC LIMIT 0,17
SELECT partner_id partnerId,partner_name partnerName, partner_type partnerType FROM cooperation_partner ORDER BY cooperation_partner.partner_id
mapper.delete: delete from t_site_home_project where project_id=#{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} limit 1
